source.name: Vecna: Eve of Ruin
source.author: Amanda Hamon, Makenzie De Armas, Ron Lundeen, Patrick Renie
source.description: Save existence from annihilation by the evil lich god Vecna in this epic, multiverse-spanning adventure. Vecna: Eve of Ruin is a high-stakes DUNGEONS & DRAGONS adventure traversing the worlds of the Forgotten Realms, Planescape, Spelljammer, Eberron, Ravenloft, Dragonlance, and Greyhawk!
